raw_body: FERNANDO – MITHRAKA (M.B.C). Ever loving husband of Dilhani, cherished and doting father of Medhaka and Dheeraka, father-in-law of Indu and Charithya, beloved son of the late Merril E.C. Fernando and late Bermil Fernando, son-in-law of the late A.L.M. Fernando and Rita Ranasinghe, affectionate brother of Murdu, brother-in-law of Sasanka, Dilukshan and Ashra.
